divs: sighting detailsit was 8;05 p.m was washing car in driveway. my girlfriend came out to see what i was doing. she then, in a shocked voice said" what the heck is that thing up there in the sky. i turned and looked in a southeast direction and saw something ive never seen before and never seen reported on the t.v. a huge fireball was flying through the air at a leisurly pace towards us. it was pulsating with a color pattern that isnt quite natural. it was pulsating with red\orange then pulsated with an orange white..the white color i could only make out after the object came closer. the object changed direction a few times fading to the s.e then comming back. i would like to say that the hight was about the hight of 10 degrees above horizon. as i watched the object my girlfreind had to go back into the house and when she left i watched the object begin to move towards the south and climb in hight untill i could no longer see it. the whole thing lasted about 15 minutes. after the incident i came inside to check the news of any wrecks or meteors in the area..i found nothing so far. note: my girlfriend hates u.f.o stuff and syfy so its shocking in itself at least to me that she said it may be a ufo while being totally serious. sadly i did not take pictures or video but would bet my life that noone could explain it to me without comming to the same conclusion as i have...unless breaking news comes on tonight with the story of some kind of wierd jet crash in the immediate area.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Tremont
There were no other sightings in Tremont on or around September 1st 2012
Summary: bright fireball but not quite fireball moving in sky.
